status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on the vibrate button does not vibrate the phone.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the Vibrate table row.
7.You will get a page with vibrate button on it.Tap on it.
8.Notice that the phone does not vibrate.

Actual result:
1.The phone does not vibrate after taping on vibrate button.

Expected result:
1.The phone should vibrate after tapping on vibrate button.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Phone-->Vibrate:Tapping on the vibrate button does not vibrate the phone.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone mango

comments.body: We do support vibrate, however Firefox Mobile (on Android) is the only browser that supports it.
